languages.text: "Не думаю, что кто-то согласится даже на временное перемирие. Они настолько друг друга ненавидят, что готовы бездумно пролить хоть всю кровь Орселлио, лишь бы новаторский трон не достался другой стороне".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что кто-то согласится даже на временное премирие. Они настолько друг друга ненавидят, что готовы бездумно пролить хоть всю кровь Орселлио, лишь бы новаторский трон не достался другой стороне".

languages.text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что кто-то согласится даже на временное перемирие. Они настолько друг друга ненавидят, что готовы бездумно пролить хоть всю кровь Орселлио, лишь бы новаторский трон не достался другой стороне".

traits.locale_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They hate each other with such vehemence that they would sooner spill every drop of the Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

"I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They hate each other with such vehemence that they would sooner spill every drop of the Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

"I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of the Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

"I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of the Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

"I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

"I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

languages.text: 「短期間であれ、双方が休戦協定を受け入れるとは思えません。互いが互いを激しく忌み嫌っていますから、ノベイターの座を裏切ってでも、平和よりオーセリオの血を最後の一滴まで流す方をを望むでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: 「短期間であれ、双方が休戦協定を受け入れるとは思えません。互いが互いを激しく忌み嫌っていますから、ノベイターの座を裏切ってでも、平和よりオーセリオの血を最後の一滴まで流す方をを望むでしょう」

languages.text: “我认为他们恐怕不打算停战，哪怕是暂时休战也不愿意。他们彼此深恶痛绝，宁可让奥赛罗家族所有人流干最后一滴血，也不愿意看到大族长的宝座落到对方手中。”
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: “我认为他们恐怕不打算停战，哪怕是暂时休战也不愿意。他们彼此深恶痛绝，宁可让奥塞罗家族所有人流干最后一滴血，也不愿意看到大族长的宝座落到对方手中。”

languages.text: « Je doute que les uns comme les autres acceptent la moindre trêve. Ils se détestent à un point tel qu'ils préféreraient faire couler le sang Orsellio jusqu'à la dernière goutte plutôt que de voir le trône de Novator revenir à l'autre camp. »
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute que les uns comme les autres acceptent la moindre trêve. Ils se détestent à un point tel qu'ils préféreraient faire couler le sang Orsellio jusqu'à la dernière goutte plutôt que de voir le trône de Novator revenir à l'autre camp. »

languages.text: «No creo que ninguno de ellos consienta un armisticio, por provisional que sea. Se aborrecen con tal vehemencia que preferirían derramar hasta la última gota de sangre Orsellio antes que ceder el trono del Novator al otro bando».
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que ninguno de ellos consienta un armisticio, por provisional que sea. Se aborrecen con tal vehemencia que preferirían derramar hasta la última gota de sangre Orsellio antes que ceder el trono del Novator al otro bando».

languages.text: "Ich glaube kaum, dass einer von ihnen wenigstens einem kurzen Waffenstillstand zustimmen würde. Sie verabscheuen einander mit einer solchen Vehemenz, dass sie lieber jeden einzelnen Tropfen Orsellio-Blut vergießen, als zuzulassen, dass der Novatorenthron an die andere Seite fällt."
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube kaum, dass einer von ihnen wenigstens einem kurzen Waffenstillstand zustimmen würde. Sie verabscheuen einander mit einer solchen Vehemenz, dass sie lieber jeden einzelnen Tropfen Orsellio-Blut vergießen, als zuzulassen, dass der Novatorenthron an die andere Seite fällt."

languages.text: "Kimsenin kısa bir süreliğine olsun ateşkes kabul edeceğini sanmıyorum. Birbirlerinden öyle hınçla nefret ediyorlar ki, Rota Reisi tahtına diğer taraftan birinin oturmasını görmektense Orsellio kanı taşıyan herkesin ölmesini yeğlerler."
languages.original_text: "I do not think any of them will agree even to a brief armistice. They abhor each other with such vehemence, they would rather spill every drop of Orsellio blood than see the Novator's throne go to the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Kimsenin kısa bir süreliğine olsun ateşkes kabul edeceğini sanmıyorum. Birbirlerinden öyle hınçla nefret ediyorlar ki, Rota Reisi tahtına diğer taraftan birinin oturmasını görmektense Orsellio kanı taşıyan herkesin ölmesini yeğlerler."
